reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, well-made, and comfortable, with nice soft velvet fabric that's perfect for holiday parties and winter events. The color receives positive feedback, and one customer notes it looks like an expensive dress after washing. The fit and flattering aspects receive mixed reviews - while some find it fits nicely, others say it's not true to size, and while some find it flattering, others say it's not flattering. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely and comfortable
items.body: This dress is very flattering but also quite comfortable. It is soft and well fitting. I wore it to a semi formal event and got lots of compliments. This is a great value for the money. It looks quite elegant. Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Burgundy xl dress
items.body: I ordered my regular size of xl... fits so well... not tight.. wiggle room... beautiful color. I do carry my weight in my belly... and I still feel like this dress is forgiving and flares out in a way that compliments my body. Its not a heavy dress lightweight Read more
items.author: maria

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and comfortable
items.author: Kristine Sombrea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress
items.body: The dress is cute and quality is great, but the style is not for me. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality fabric/ nicely made
items.body: I loved this dress but had to return it. The fit was very nicely contoured but it didn't match my petite proportions (it was too long in the waist for me). I wish the company would consider making these dresses in a petite size. Read more
items.author: Lisa M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress!
items.body: Buy this dress! I was blown away by the quality and how beautiful the velvet was. The fit is so flattering especially for us curvy ladies. The material is a little thick but that is to be expected from a nice velvet. If you need a new christmas dress, this is it! Read more
items.author: Cass VonD

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t
items.body: It’s a cute fit but so cheap. Walmart has better quality. First there is the waist ribbon that has nothing to hold it in place so it rolls up when you walk instead of staying at the waste where it should. Second the arms roll up?? Idk how that’s even a thing but they curl and roll up on themselves whilst wearing it. The final straw was that I purchased this for pictures. ONLY wore it for pictures and before I even got the first one taken noticed there is a run in the fabric on the front. I have already taken the tags off and honestly can’t tell if it came that way or if it’s so cheap getting from the house to my car somehow caused a run. 1/5 stars because in the 5 minutes I had it on before the belt started to roll and wouldn’t stay in place/the sleeves rolled up and I discovered the run it was a cute fit if only cheap fabric. Absurd price for a one time outfit that I’m sure didn’t photograph well. Will add more pics when I get photos back if photographer can’t edit out the above issues Read more
items.author: Jade & Icia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress and great value.
items.body: Purchased for a fall wedding. I’m 5’4 and ordered a large. I ordered burgundy and absolutely love it. Pics are from straight out of the bag. I really like the heaviness of the material and how it hangs. :) I’m not a heels person, so I’m pairing it with a pair of burgundy velvet loafers. :) Read more
items.author: Jenny Carroll

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Formal Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Formal Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, V-navy, V-burgundy, Black, Dark Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
